properties.areaDesc: Presque Isle Light to Sturgeon Pt MI Including Thunder Bay National Marine Sanctuary; Sturgeon Pt to Alabaster MI; St Ignace to False Detour Channel; Straits of Mackinac within 5 nm of Mackinac Bridge including Mackinac Island; 5NM East of Mackinac Bridge to Presque Isle Light MI including Bois Blanc Island
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 4 at 3:07AM EST until February 4 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Gaylord MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Highest gusts up to 30 kt and highest waves around 6
feet.

* WHERE...Straits of Mackinac within 5 nm of Mackinac Bridge
including Mackinac Island, St Ignace to False Detour Channel,
5NM East of Mackinac Bridge to Presque Isle Light MI including
Bois Blanc Island, Presque Isle Light to Sturgeon Pt MI
Including Thunder Bay National Marine Sanctuary and Sturgeon
Pt to Alabaster MI.

* WHEN...Until 11 PM EST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM EST THIS EVENING
